findings.message:
HP.buyToken(address,uint256) (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#135-153) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- toGive = tokenPerETH.mul(_invest) / 1000000000000000000 (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#136)
	- bonus = toGive * 10 / 100 (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#140)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
HP.buyToken(address,uint256) (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#135-153) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- toGive = tokenPerETH.mul(_invest) / 1000000000000000000 (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#136)
	- bonus = toGive * 20 / 100 (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#143)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
HP.fallback() (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#114-133) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- valueToGive = valueToGive.div(1000000).mul(999999) (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#127)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
HP.buyToken(address,uint256) (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#135-153) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- toGive = tokenPerETH.mul(_invest) / 1000000000000000000 (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#136)
	- bonus = toGive * 30 / 100 (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#146)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
HP.totalSupply (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#59) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#34)
findings.name: shadowing-abstract

findings.message:
HP.transferOwnership(address) (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#92-96) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#94)
findings.name: events-access

findings.message:
HP.fallback() (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#114-133) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(blacklist[investor] == false) (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#120)
findings.name: boolean-equal

findings.message:
HP.totalRemaining (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#64) is set pre-construction with a non-constant function or state variable:
	- totalSupply.sub(totalDistributed)
findings.name: function-init-state

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.18 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.18 (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#3)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

	- valueToGive = valueToGive.div(1000000).mul(999999) (0x0c1a07d17f39a179245f2ef277cef97671cf9648.sol#127)
findings.name: too-many-digits
